DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine impact lifestyle intervention postpartum weight loss . So investigators two group study . In Experimental group woman receive Healthy Lifestyle Intervention . This intervention deliver 12 week . In Control group woman receive general information via pamphlet postpartum period tip stress management .
DOC.brief_title: A Lifestyle Program Healthy Weight Postpartum Period
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct two phase . In first phase , investigator conduct cross-sectional study assess factor relate healthy lifestyle childbirth base PRECEDE model . Regarding result study , investigator plan implement lifestyle promote intervention evaluate effect intervention weight reduction among postpartum woman .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy Lactating Nonsmoking Fullterm birth Lack medical problem Lack pregnancyrelated complication ( eg , multiple pregnancy , fetal anomaly , fetal maternal complication current previous pregnancy , hypertension pregnancy ) . Nonparticipation study may affect result . 18.5≤ BMI≤29 pregnancy Women sedentary accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire . Unwilling continue participation study Pregnancy study Suffering physical problem study Smoking birth
